Transcription for 31491

It worked like this, when you were married,
and you had a boy coming up to Colery status at 13,
then you were leaving school,
you would get knowledge of one of the men
about the village, went to the Workman's Institute,
which was just coming into vogue,
or about the football field,
you want a boy underground, you want a boy.
Then you go and see that man, ask him,
could you come to work them underground,
write who he'd fix up with, the officials of Colery,
who just signed on, and away to go.
